properties.name: Club House
properties.description: Welcome to Club House, a charming three-bedroom semi-detached family home located in the sought-after area of Petts Wood. This attractive property is situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station, providing fast trains to London, and is within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes, and the scenic National Trust woodland. Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior Club House is a superb family home that combines modern living with convenience and charm. With its spacious interior, excellent location, and additional features, it is perfect for those seeking a comfortable and stylish residence in Petts Wood. Donâ€™t miss the opportunity to make this your dream home.

properties.name: Modern Apartment
properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

properties.name: Family Home
properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom family home in a quiet suburban neighborhood. Close to schools, parks, and public transportation. The property features a modern kitchen, two bathrooms, and a lovely backyard. Perfect for growing families.

properties.name: City Apartment
properties.description: Modern two-bedroom apartment in the heart of the city. Close to shopping centers, restaurants, and public transit. The flat offers an open-plan living space, contemporary kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

properties.name: Luxury Mansion
properties.description: Elegant five-bedroom house with a spacious garden in an upscale neighborhood. The property boasts a gourmet kitchen, multiple living areas, and a master suite with a luxurious bathroom. Ideal for those seeking luxury living.

properties.name: Cosy Apartment
properties.description: Charming one-bedroom flat with a modern interior. Located in a vibrant neighborhood with trendy cafes and boutiques. The flat includes a cozy bedroom, stylish kitchen, and a balcony overlooking the city.

properties.name: Contemporary House
properties.description: Contemporary four-bedroom house with a sleek design and panoramic views. Situated in a modern residential development with access to amenities and green spaces. The property features an open-plan kitchen, a private terrace, and a master suite.
